item.title: RuPaul Becomes Most Nominated Reality Host in Emmys History With 10 Nods for ‘Drag Race’
item.description: RuPaul has sashayed into the history books after landing an Emmy nomination for outstanding host for a reality or competition program. The host, producer and mother of all drag queens earned his 10th
